overview:
Director of Business Development in the whole Latin America for Buongiorno Spa, Filippo Satolli has been working in the Internet and Telco market for more than 7 years. In particular he deepened his expertise in the LatAm market where he has been working and living since 2007 creating solid relationships with the main Telco operators, top music labels and principal mobile & internet companies. With specific skills in business development, strategy and social relationship he has played a key role in the geographical expansion of the company in that region.

As Board Director of MEF LatAm he has already been actively working for 2 years, reaching important goals on the mobile market regulation and healthy growth (i.e. the Unified Term of Conduct for the Brazilian VAS Market). His deep knowledge of both the Italian and Latin America markets will also help MEF LatAm to anticipate and manage the risks and opportunities associated with launching new services in fast-growing emerging markets.

Filippo started his career at Accenture Spa where he managed strategic projects for the leading Telco companies in Italy and Brazil developing skills on strategy, operations, marketing, financial and organizational issues.

Filippo did his degree in Business Administration with Specialization in Finance at the well-known Bocconi University in Milan.
